Name: Lord Santiago Espinosa
Details: The leader of House Espinosa, his sister was married to High Lord Tamati's until both their deaths in a JumpShip accident in 3022. In the same year and with the help of his daughter, Victoria, Santiago Espinosa staged a coup against his niece, Kamea Arano, and installed the Aurigan Directorate, a more centralized government than the previous Aurigan Reach.
